name: Shining into the deep
description:
On a hopeless day, I run. 
Runaway from the madness. Escape it
To the island in a faraway land called "Pha Ngan" in Thailand.

On a tiring day sitting on the beach
The sun is going down, suddenly it shines the light on the water surface 
It sparkling
Like 'Hope' shining through 

I feel the light
I feel the hope
I feel the beauty
"Shining into the deep" 

Here it is.
Your 'Hope'
